page.title: 02THE HIGH WYCOMBE CREST HOTEL
page.content: THE CREST HOTEL IS SITUATED NEAR THE{ {M40}MOTORWAY INTERCHANGE NEAR{HANDY {CROSS}SPORTS CENTRE IN{HIGH WYCOMBE.} WHEN WE WENT THERE WE SPOKE TO THE MANAGER. CONSTRUCTION WORK STARTED ON THE HOTEL IN THE LATTER PART OF 1981.IT WAS OPENED ON 14TH APRIL 1983.{THE HIGH {WYCOMBE }CREST HAS HELPED EMPLOYMENT IN THE WYCOMBE AREA AS 116 STAFF ARE EMPLOYED.THERE ARE 118 ROOMS.THE HOTEL HAS MANY{FACILITIES. }HERE ARE SOME OF THEM:A RESTAURANT,A BAR,BANQUETING FACILITIES,CONFERENCE-ROOMS AND A JOGGING-TRACK. {THE HIGH WYCOMBE}CREST HOTEL IS ONE OF A CHAIN OF 55 IN THE .U.K. AND 40 AROUND EUROPE.THE HOTEL RENTS OUT 30,000 ROOMS A YEAR AND ON AVERAGE THE ROOMS ARE USED 75% OF THE TIME.
